title: Heart Disease Prediction
summary: Predictive application designed to estimate potential heart-related risk levels.
details:
Predictive application designed to estimate potential heart-related risk levels.

Utilizes user-provided health attributes to generate awareness-oriented outputs.

Focused on clean interaction, straightforward input flow, and clear result visibility.

Demonstrates thoughtful use of data-driven decision concepts in a user-friendly context.

Aims to support early awareness, without replacing clinical evaluation.

title: StartupKart
summary: Web-based platform concept for discovering startup-related insights and resources.
details:
Web-based platform concept for discovering startup-related insights and resources.

Helps users explore ideas, opportunities, and entrepreneurial information in one space.

Built with emphasis on intuitive navigation and organized content presentation.

Encourages knowledge sharing within the startup ecosystem through accessible UI layouts.

Designed to simplify engagement for individuals interested in startups and innovation.
